author: Mike Deme
comment: Absolutely looooove this face, could you please have the option to display watch battery. Thank you Dev

author: Swapnil Sathe
comment: Most underrated but beautiful and simple facewatch must try it !
title: Simple and elegant

author: john florez
comment: Glad to see one of my favorite pebble watch faces making the move to wear!  Just need to that date bar at the bottom for it to be complete. Still love it though. Straightforward and simple here.

reply.author: Niamor
reply.content: Thanks for your comment. You can now choose to display the date on the watch face.

title: Big ol' simple clock watch face

author: chris jones
comment: It freezes and does not tell time. Useless

reply.author: Niamor
reply.content:
The watchface has just been updated to correct this issue.
Sorry for the inconvenience.

title: Not working

comment: Je pensais à l'installer depuis le store de la montre mais pas depuis le portable

reply.author: Niamor
reply.content: D'accord, je comprends. Dès que j'aurai un peu de temps, je me pencherai sur la question. Merci.
